com.planetbiru.pushserver.database

Class QueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.planetbiru.pushserver.database.QueryBuilder

  • public class QueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    QueryBuilder is SQL command builder based on the database type.
    Author:
    Kamshory, MT

      • endQueryBuilder

        public QueryBuilder endQueryBuilder()
        End SQL with semicolon. When this method called, query can not be continued.
        Returns:
        QueryBuilder object

      • newQuery

        public QueryBuilder newQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Clear buffer and start a new query. Be careful to create native query because each of database system has different structure.
        Parameters:
        query - Initial query string
        Returns:
        QueryBuilder object

        public QueryBuilder update(java.lang.String query)

        public QueryBuilder set(java.lang.String query)

      • groupBy

        public QueryBuilder groupBy(java.lang.String query)
        Create query GROUP BY. This function will add GROUP BY to the buffer followed by field to group the result to the buffer. Be careful! Each database system has different way to group the result.
        Parameters:
        query - Field to group the result
        Returns:
        QueryBuilder object

      • orderBy

        public QueryBuilder orderBy(java.lang.String query)
        Create query ORDER BY. This function will add ORDER BY to the buffer followed by field to order the result. Be careful! Some database system can sort by alias but the others can not.
        Parameters:
        query - Sort order the result by field and direction
        Returns:
        QueryBuilder object

      • limit

        public QueryBuilder limit(long query)
        Set the limit of the result. This function will add LIMIT and OFFSET to the buffer according to database system.
        Parameters:
        query - Maximum number of the result will be returned by SELECT query
        Returns:
        QueryBuilder object

      • offset

        public QueryBuilder offset(long query)
        Set the offset of the result. This function will add LIMIT and OFFSET to the buffer according to database system.
        Parameters:
        query - Offset of the result will be returned by SELECT query
        Returns:
        QueryBuilder object
